title: The Stakeout
description: Detective Audrey Roscoe's life in a small mid-western town appears uneventful until the wife of her homicide partner is found dead. With the latest advances in forensic science, Audrey sets out to clear her partner's name before it's too late. Plagued by one dead end after another, Audrey quickly learns someone wants her to pay the ultimate price. Will she discover the identity of the murderer before they kill again or will she become the next victim?
author: Elizabeth A. Hale
